A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have a hard time with this film due to being a life long star wars fan. While watching it and being engrossed in the film\, I actually enjoyed it (minus space vegas and Finn) However once leaving the theater I could not help but be sad at the fact that any and all expectations I had (mainly for Luke) were just not fulfilled. I understand why the story was taken in that direction\, but in my opinion it should have been saved for the third film.
